name: Cleaning The System
description:
In this platformer, you are a stick with bumpers that needs to reach the end of the level. You must bounce, slide, swim, or whatever is needed to get there.

Features

  • Different Mechanics: Bouncing, Swimming, Sliding, Launching, Gliding, Floating
  • Speedrunning: Race against other players' times to be the fastest
  • Split-screen Multiplayer: Race against 3 other friends on the same screen
  • Level Editor: Create and Play levels created by other players
